snippet.title: Highline VR Volleyball match 2 VS 2 multiplayer (awesome volleyball in virtual reality)
snippet.description:
After having successfully released the 1 vs 1 multiplayer mode we are soon delivering the 2 VS 2 multiplayer  :
In this video 2 VR Players are fighting for victory with the help of their CPU teammates.

This is just a preview, but is already a lot of fun, we will make a longer video of gameplay when the update will be live.

One is playing with HTC Vive on PC and the other player is playing on a Quest 2 with Steam link.

Join us now, help us funding and allowing us to improve the quality of our indie game by buying our early access and wishlisting it on Steam.

Visit our steam store page to know more about the game and try the free demo :

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1852940/Highline_Volleyball_VR?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=youtube2vs2

Music recorded from the game and licensed by Jamendo S.A.
